meanings.definition: A wild fig tree native to the Mediterranean region.
meanings.sent1: The caprifigs provided shade for the animals in the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: The farmers admired the beauty of the caprifigs growing in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The caprifigs whispered secrets to the passing breeze.
meanings.sent4: The caprifigs stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the caprifigs filled the air with magic.

meanings.definition: The fruit of the caprifig tree, used in the pollination of cultivated fig trees.
meanings.sent1: The delicious caprifigs attracted bees for pollination.
meanings.sent2: The farmers harvested the ripe caprifigs for their fig trees.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole caprifigs to play pranks on the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The caprifigs danced in the wind, spreading their pollen like confetti.
meanings.sent5: The golden hue of the caprifigs shimmered in the sunlight, beckoning the bees.
